LearnMoreDocM.title: HOW FAR THE TEST VERSION GOES

texts.2: Currently ConfidIA is being tested on Python3 Any other version of Python could cause slowdowns
texts.4: Syntax error handling features will be included in the short term Currently, any code that cannot be executed can cause slowdowns
texts.6: At the moment, having a hard definition of large objects can lead to slowdowns (e.g., lists/dictionaries/etc. with several hundred lines and/or nested objects)

MobileWarningM.message: We recommend using ConfidIA on a computer!
